title: All the rivers run [DVD]
creator_credit: Crawford Productions, Hector Crawford and Ian Crawford
brief_description: A story of love between a man, a woman and the river which bound them together. After being shipwrecked a young woman accepts her uncle’s offer of the chance to begin a new life at Echuca where she meets her future husband. Together, they start a business carrying cargo on the Murray River. An adventurous story set in the early days of white settlement on the Murray River. Based on the novel by Nancy Cato.
